resources.string:
Guidelines and Safety Precautions

1. Choose the appropriate amount and type of exercise.


2. Terminate the exercise session if any chest pain, shortness of breath, and light-headedness are experienced.


3. Please warm up before starting to exercise. Ensure the warming up duration lasts for at least 5 minutes or more.


4. Please cool down after finishing the exercise session. Ensure the cooling down duration lasts for at least 5 minutes or more.


5. Please include aerobic conditioning workouts which last for at least 20 minutes to 60 minutes.

i-HeLP is a manual exercise prescription app that encourages the target population to take control of their health for good through a tailored workout plan prescribed directly by a healthcare professional.\n
\t\t\t\tThrough a combination of technology and health, i-HeLP aims to help users with non-chronic and metabolic conditions meet their health goals and improvise their lifestyles.\n
\t\t\t\ti-HeLP which is still under a research project for now incorporates the latest in proven health and behavioral science to become a platform of choice for many users as well as healthcare providers soon.
